Content: I live in the Southend area of Essex, England. I am 72 and sonewhat disabled and have been riding motorcycles for some 56 years. How ever my health has taken a turn for the worse so last year I had to sell my MotoGuzzi Nevada 750 as it was too heavy. For over a year now I have been looking to buy a motorcycle and sidecar or a trike WITH a reverse gear for a reasonable amount of money. So far I have not been sucessful, yes there are plenty of Gold Wings that would fit the bill but they all seem to have been brought up by dealers whom want a heap of cash for them. Any idears??
